reviewText:
This series of movies done by Tom Selleck and company are absolutely beautifully done.  From the music score to the sets, lighting, casting, location shots - I find myself re-watching one every now and then, which is rare for me.

The screenplay and story are a haunting rendition of Parker's stories.

I heartily recommend all of the Jesse Stone movies, as well as Thin Ice/No Remorse.
I have every one of the Jesse Stone series that are out on DVD.  They are great and so is Tom Selleck!  You will not be disapointed.

These movies are better than the books( by Robert B. Parker) they are based on.
Tom Selleck is a great Stone.
m.h.o.
Love me some Tom Affleck..
excelent
Perfect
Excellent films with great acting.
Love all of the Jesse Stone series... can't wait to purchase the next two... as soon as they become as reasonably priced as these two.
not quite up to par with other's in the series
Always enjoyed this series.  Happy with the image, sound, etc.

Excellent story lines and excellent acting
enjoyable series
High quality DVD presentation
Tom Selleck is one of todays greatest actors and this series is top quality
have watched the whole series a hundred times at least
never get tired of Tom Selleck as Jesse Stone
chfancier fancier of fine movies
No problems.
great movie good to watch with the family
We like to watch Jesse Stone when there is not much on TV. We enjoy his laid-back style, the dog who looks at him in a laid-back wonderment, and just how he plays the field. Good series.
Some of the best of Selleck's movies
Love this series.
Great movies
I love these movies
Wife and I enjoy all the Jesse Stone movies we purchased!
Fantastic, great quality and arrived as promised. Well done.
On time, works great.
Good movie!
I enjoyed both movies. I think Tom Selleck is a great actor. I recommend the Jesse Stone series to everyone!
awesome thank u
Robert B. Parker and Tom Selleck go together beautifully. Selleck makes a good Jesse Stone.
Love this series. I have them all now!
great movies - unexpected action.  Love Jesse Stone movies
Wonderful mystery series with Tom Selleck doing some of his best work ever.
Excellent
The Jesse Stone movies are great. Adding them to my collection .
it was great made for a great evening of movie watching and popcorn eating.
LOVE Jesse Stone!!!
enjoyed
Still do not understand the raves. Decent made-for-TV dramas but not exactly award material.

I really enjoy this series.

love these movies .. bought these for my mom who also loves Tom

It's impossible to get a bad Jesse Stone movie. Love them and Tom Selleck
love it
I've said this before - We love Jesse Stone!
excellant
Love this series

Excellent DVD Movies!  Good Quality, Received per the delivery time stated.  So Happy I purchased these movies.
love the jesse stone movies !  These came timely and were as deescribed
Excellent

Another Great Tom Selleck movie.. Great addition to the Jesse Stone series, enjoyed them all.
Love the books and the movies.
great movies, great deal
Good deal; no problems!  :)
Tom Selleck at his best.  This whole series is just so cool.  The acting, and directing is so good that you think you are there with them.
Tom Selleck simply becomes better and better with age. I hope more of these movies will be made. I thoroughly enjoy them!
Like the DVDs with two or more films in one container.
Fast shipping and order was as discribed
great  movies, enjoyed them very much
Every one of the Jesse Stone movies my husband and I have seen - we have loved.  Tom Selleck is perfect as Jesse Stone.  We love the books, we love the movies.  Wish there were more!
good show
Very good cop series. If you like Tom Selleck, you'll like these.
Great character

I have purchased all of the dvds of these Jesse Stone movies - I LOVE them. The price was extremely reasonable, too. I wish more were available. If Tom Selleck made more of the books into movies, I would buy them in an instant!
Good  DVD....
Fantastic move!!
terrific like blue bloods
Great Movies!!
We both LOVE the Jesse Stone series, and have all of the ones we could find to buy, at least so far.  If there are still more out there, we will purchase those also!
Love these movies. Sellecks even persona with no hysterics make these a solid performance series.
Always a Tom Seleck fan.  I ordered the whole Jesse Stone series for my husband - also a fan.
Arrived as promised and I have enjoyed watching them already. I am a big Jesse Stone fan and was glad to find them at such a great price!
Really like Tom Selleck as Jesse Stone.
I love tom selleck and I received these dvds in excellent condition
delivery was on time, movies are great
I enjoy these and have watched them twice already.
totally enjoyable series of movies
great stories about Jesse Stone...enjoyed the double set!
Good movies. Fun to watch.

Tom Selleck is outstanding as Jesse Stone.  I have collected all of the DVD's of the Jesse Stone series and love them.  I highly recommend these movies to anyone who enjoys well thought out, well acted, understated stories.  The sound track is also amazing!
The price is right and the shows are something I am enjoying as I have time to view them, yeah.
All 8 of these movies are very well done. Tom Selleck is a true, down to earth, rough guy in this series.
These are two of the last movies adapted from the Jesse Stone character. Tom Selleck does a nice job in creating a setting and character that reflect the rugged Northeast Coastal town of Paradise.

I do not watch TV and was unaware of this series of movies until I ran across them on Amazon Prime. I wound up buying the entire series. It is nice to watch a show with a little heart. Not too many of those left. CBS has apparently canceled the series and has shown they are no smarter than NBC.
This is an amazing movie to watch and I would enjoy seeing it over and over cant get tired of this movie at all
I love these Jesse Stone stories, what a deal two movies for the price of one.  Two great movies looking forward to enjoying them over and over again.
I Like all the Jesse Stone movies - wish they were still making them.  If not with Tom Sellick, maybe Ben Afflick.
Tom Selleck is always good and this character continues to interest and excite me. The story lines continue in a timely fashion and just make me want more,.

I won't get into the plots.

Disk is well produced, no skips and the volume is consistent.  There are two disks but at least they are in just one case.
I like the mystery and how the case is solved. It is not predictable. I like that the same characters are in each movie, portrayed by the same actors.
Another great Jesse Stone movie.
All Jesse Stone movies are very good..
Love this series. Product came on time, very pleased.
Who doesn't love Tom Selleck as Jesse Stone.  Brooding and quiet but he gets things done.
Like it.
Love them
Love Jesse stone stories

Enjoyable set of Jesse Stone films with Tom Selleck. I did prefer the first few movies more than these. Overall, enjoyable, but not as good as the earlier ones before Actor Sellect took over as executive producer and made some changes.
